messages.title: Why I am backing Anna McMorrin
messages.content: The Tory candidate in Cardiff North said that if they win and send Theresa May back to number 10, they will consider their job done. We must not let that happen. Anna fights for the essential jobs Cardiff needs to prosper here for the best deal for Cardiff and Wales.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Pledge to protect local public services, defend NHS and schools.
Strong voice standing up to protect pensioners' incomes and campaigning for a £10 living wage, jobs and prosperity.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour is the only Party that can defeat the Tories.

issues.brexitEurope: May's Brexit puts us at risk.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm proud to be standing in Cardiff North, where I lived for 15 years and where my children go to school. I know what a great uncertainty we have right now, and I believe our local people and our capital have the knowledge and experience to lead challenges. We must get better jobs and housing for people, Welsh Labour is the only Party that can defeat the Tories.

endorsements.endorsement: Anna will be a strong voice for you as MP. I know she won’t stop campaigning on jobs, the environment and a fairer society.

quotes.text: As your Welsh Labour MP, I will listen to you, improve air quality for us all, valiantly champion families, defend our children, ensure the NHS has the funding it needs, and make sure we get the maximum opportunities they deserve.

images.caption: Anna McMorrin with supporter Julie Morgan.
